name: Custom Roll20 Mod
description:
For Roll20.Net specifically for D&D 5e OGL and Darker Dungeons Character Sheets.

For Roll20.Net specifically for D&D 5e OGL and Darker Dungeons Character Sheets.

This is my own take originally based upon on the 'Sand and Paper' by 'shevernitskiy' and some other codes specifically originally credited to Keith Curtis.

I would also highly recommend adding Keith Curtis' Roll20 Hide Toolbar Buttons, while not essential many regular users don't actively use half the buttons.
additional_info:
The sheet is being currently being constantly updated. Thus, you can update for the latest versions. In a new version there will be fixes and design changes, so I'd advise you copy and paste the code and save in a notepad before an update in case you just don't like my design tastes.

I've a few more updates to do, included moving all the images to github rather than imgur.
